warmup.description: Child’s Pose (Balasana): Sit back on your heels and stretch your arms forward to warm up your spine and hips.
Cat-Cow Pose (Marjaryasana-Bitilasana): Alternate between arching and rounding your back to sync breath with movement.
Sun Salutations (Surya Namaskar): A dynamic flow that energizes your body.
Standing Side Stretch: Lengthen your spine and sides by gently bending side-to-side.
Neck Rolls: Release tension in your neck with slow, gentle rolls.

coreFlow.description: Warrior II (Virabhadrasana II): Strengthen your legs and improve focus.
Triangle Pose (Trikonasana): Stretch your hips and hamstrings with an open chest.
Chair Pose (Utkatasana): Build strength in your legs and core in this semi-squat position.
Plank to Side Plank: Alternate between a regular plank and side planks to strengthen your core.
Low Lunge to Crescent Lunge: Stretch your hips and engage your legs.
Tree Pose (Vrikshasana): Improve balance and focus by standing on one leg.
Downward Dog to Upward Dog: Alternate these poses to build strength and flexibility.

coolDown.description: Seated Forward Bend (Paschimottanasana): Stretch your hamstrings and relax your back.
Supine Spinal Twist (Supta Matsyendrasana): Release tension in your lower back with this gentle twist.
Happy Baby Pose (Ananda Balasana): Loosen your hips while lying on your back.
Savasana (Corpse Pose): Relax completely and absorb the benefits of your practice.
